document_data.name: Gorloun
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorloun''' was a [[dragon]] of immense size, might, and age, who founded the first draconic empire of [[Abeir]].
document_data.History: Gorloun founded its nation some time after the [[War of Fang and Talon]], in the continent of [[Laerakond]]. Many other dragons followed Gorloun's example, ushering the [[Rule of Dragons]].
